item.irons_spellbooks.energized_core.fai: A calm sky holds no power; the core remains inert
death.attack.irons_spellbooks.sacrifice: %1$s was blasted away by %2$s's sacrificial magic
spell.irons_spellbooks.sacrifice.guide: Target one of your magic summons to cause them to explode, killing them instantly, and dealing large damage in the area around them. The summon's remaining health boosts the damage dealt and radius of explosion.
death.attack.irons_spellbooks.ball_light: %1$s was zapped to death by %2$s while using %3$s
spell.irons_spellbooks.ball_lightning.gu: Conjure an orb of lightning that slowly moves forward, damaging creatures it phases through and bouncing off blocks.
item.irons_spellbooks.spell_slot_upgrade: Improves Spell Book capacity, up to %s Slots
advancements.irons_spellbooks.staff_ligh: Transform a Lightning Rod into a Rod O' Lightning... And survive the process.
%1$s was blasted away by %2$s's sacrificial magic while using %3$s
ui.irons_spellbooks.cast_error_adventure: This spell cannot be cast from Adventure Mode!
spell.irons_spellbooks.flaming_barrage.g: Cast to select targets, which at the end of recasting, will each be under barrage of small fireballs.
item.irons_spellbooks.lightning_rod.guid: Obtained by using an Energized Core on a Lightning Rod
